name: Steampunk Granny Style - surreal steampunk female portraits (steampunkgranny)
description:
This style has been trained on 50 Midjourney head and shoulders portraits of old women in steampunk style. It can produce young women, but men very hard.

Recommended settings:

Canvas: 512x512 with high res fix at 1.5 or 2.0 upscale

Models: realistic (Deliberate, AnalogMadness) or Midjourney family (Dreamshaper, Dreamlike Diffusion, Protogen family etc). Anime models perform well.

Simple concept, feel free to experiment with simple and detailed prompts and share your results in the comments.
